channel.title: CVE Feed for siteground -- Security Optimizer – The All-In-One WordPress Protection Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for siteground -- Security Optimizer – The All-In-One WordPress Protection Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-0993|2024-10-15T15:25:06.942Z -- siteground -- security%20optimizer%20%E2%80%93%20the%20all-in-one%20wordpress%20protection%20plugin
item.description: The SiteGround Security plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authentication bypass that allows unauthenticated users to log in as administrative users due to missing identity verification on the 2FA back-up code implementation that logs users in upon success. This affects versions up to, and including, 1.2.5.
